Experience

Set within the 75,000 hectares Madikwe Private Game Reserve in the North West Province of South Africa, Madikwe Hills Private Game Lodge provides an authentic safari experience in a pristine bush setting.
The reserve is home to Africa’s Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino – so guests visiting Madikwe Hills can expect good quality game viewing throughout the year.

Stay

Madikwe Hills Game Lodge consists of a Main Lodge with 10 suites & a private camp, Little Madikwe Hills consisting of a 2-bedroom suite with a private ranger, butler & vehicle. A gourmet kitchen & entertainment centre complete the picture.
The glass-fronted suites at Madikwe Hills Game Lodge are complete with a secluded verandah & plunge pool to ensure absolute privacy. Each suite features an outdoor shower, romantic bathroom & viewing deck with unobstructed views over the reserve.
The main area features a comfortable lounge, dining area, library & swimming pool.

Activities

Daily game drives are conducted in open 4x4 safari vehicles. Close animal sightings can be expected, so it is recommended to bring a good camera to snap away at some of nature’s wildest animals.
Guests can also visit the nearby local village & meet members from the Molatedi community.

subfolders.title: Jaci's Tree Lodge
subfolders.description: In the heart of the malaria-free Madikwe Game Reserve lies Jaci’s Lodges.  This area is known for some of the best game viewing in South Africa. Jaci’s Lodges consists of two luxurious camps – Jaci’s Tree Lodge & Jaci’s Safari Lodge.  Both lodges offer unique 5-star experiences for guests looking for an intimate safari experience in a relaxed & peaceful setting. Jaci’s Tree Lodge is perched high up in the trees & offers some of the most magnificent views over the African bushveld.

subfolders.title: Jamala Madikwe Royal Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Owner-managed & run, Jamala Madikwe Royal Safari Lodge is located in the famous malaria-free Madikwe Private Game Reserve in an area of untamed beauty & natural splendour. This slice of paradise is the perfect stop-over for the discerning traveller who wants to enjoy excellent Big 5 game viewing along with extravagant luxuries in a private & secluded bush setting. Five freestanding villas offer guests only the best in luxury.  Each en-suite villa enjoys expansive views of open savannas & the Jamala waterhole, ensuring good game viewing from the privacy of your room.  Each villa includes a stunning bedroom, separate lounge area, an individual rim-flow pool, sala, expansive wooden deck & outdoor shower.

subfolders.title: Madikwe Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Deep in the heart of Madikwe Private Game Reserve lies the famous Madikwe Safari Lodge, a luxurious family-friendly bushveld retreat. Offering sweeping views over the game-filled plains & Waterberg mountains, Madikwe Safari Lodge consists of 3 separate safari camps: Lelapo (12 suites) - geared towards families, Kopano (4 suites) – ideal for couples & Dhitaba (4 suites) – for guests in need of absolute privacy. These 3 separate camps at Madikwe Safari Lodge offer a total of 20 suites, each featuring a bedroom, sitting area, fireplace, en-suite bathroom, private deck & plunge pool.  Here guests can relax on comfortable sun chairs, take a dip in the pool or enjoy a book with a cocktail in hand.

subfolders.title: Morukuru Farm House
subfolders.description: Morukuru Family consists of 3 exclusive bush villas located in the malaria-free Madikwe Private Game Reserve in South Africa. These private villas include Morukuru Farm House, Morukuru Owner’s House & Morukuru River House - each villa complete with a dedicated hosting couple, butler, cleaning staff, ranger & tracker.    The villas are truly unique.  Guests staying here will be guaranteed to have a bush experience like no other.  Private, intimate & secluded – Morukuru Family offers an exclusive safari to the discerning traveller.

subfolders.title: Royal Madikwe
subfolders.description: Royal Madikwe, just like the name suggests, offers superior luxury accommodation in the heart of the Madikwe Game Reserve in South Africa. Home to the Big 5 & a variety of other wildlife, Royal Madikwe never fails to impress.  The lodge is ideal for families & friends who are looking for a luxury safari experience. Royal Madikwe can sleep up to 10 people at a time.  There are 4 double suites, 1 twin suite as well as a 2-bedroom family suite consisting of a double & twin room.  Each suite is equipped with a private deck with a plunge pool, indoor & outdoor shower as well as a fireplace for those chilly winter evenings.

subfolders.title: Tuningi Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Tuningi Safari Lodge is one of only a few 5-star safari lodges in the Madikwe Game Reserve that welcomes children & in doing so, allows them to be exposed to wildlife & nature. Situated in Big 5 country, the Madikwe Reserve provides only the best in malaria-free game viewing.  Guests often see lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, rhino, zebra, giraffe, hyena, impala & a variety of birds.  Madikwe is also one of the best places in Africa to see the famous African Wild dog. Tuningi Safari Lodge features 4 luxury suites & 2 family suites, all of which boast en-suite bathrooms with outdoor showers as well as breathtaking views from the private wrap-around decks.
